title: How to Form an LLC in Alabama: 2025 Cost & Guide
content: Starting an LLC in Alabama costs $200 and takes 7-10 business days. You must file the Articles of Organization with the Alabama Secretary of State. Annual requirements: No annual franchise tax. We recommend using a professional LLC formation service to avoid rejection and ensure compliance with Alabama state regulations. Professional services typically handle name searches, registered agent services, and ongoing compliance reminders.
